passive1.name: Spoils of War
passive1.effects: Grants a charge every 20 seconds, up to 4 charges. Melee basic attacks can consume one charge to execute minions below 350- 860 (based on level) (+ 100% AD) health. Melee basic attacks that would trigger Spoils of War gain 150 bonus range and 30% bonus attack speed. Killing a minion by any means with a charge heals you and the nearest allied champion for 15- 90 (based on missing health) health and grants them kill gold. Healing is halved if the owner is ranged. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby.

active.name: Warding
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward at the target location (600 range), which reveals the surrounding area. Holds up to 4 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.

other.limit: Limited to 1 Jungle or Gold Income item. A player may only have 3  Stealth Wards or  Totem Wards on the map at one time.
